Pre-Game Insights: Scotland will be expecting to snap their winless streak when they kick off their Euro 2024 preparations against minnows Gibraltar in Portugal.
The Tartan Army have seen their side fail to win in their last seven matches since securing qualification for this summer's tournament.
Gibraltar sits 203rd in the world rankings and have lost their last 12 games in a row.
Manager Steve Clarke will want to get through the game unscathed after striker Lyndon Dykes recently joined a lengthy injury list.
Southampton striker Che Adams is likely to lead the line in Dykes' absence.
31-goal Hearts hotshot Lawrence Shankland should be given minutes against Gibraltar.
Liverpool's rising star Ben Doak will be hoping to win a maiden cap.
